nodes.text: Purkoll was a city located on the planet Skako Minor, and headquarters of the Techno Union. The facility had D1-series aerial battle droids and octuptarra magna tri-droids guarding it. During the Clone Wars, ARC trooper Echo was experimented on there, and he was rescued during a Galactic Republic mission to the planet led by Jedi General Anakin Skywalker, Sergeant Hunter, and Clone Captain Rex, with the facility being damaged in the process.
